statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_authentication;
SELECT auth_id, username, created_at FROM user_authentication WHERE auth_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username FROM user_authentication ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE auth_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM user_authentication WHERE password = 'secure_password';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_authentication;
SELECT auth_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id=3;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name='admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_id, COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM users GROUP BY role_id HAVING total_users > 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(role_id) AS total_roles FROM user_roles GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_roles DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users;
SELECT device_id, device_name, user_id FROM devices ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, device_id, access_time FROM access_logs WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE end_time IS NULL;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT device_name, access_time FROM devices JOIN access_logs ON devices.device_id = access_logs.device_id;
SELECT users.username, devices.device_name, access_logs.access_time FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id JOIN devices ON access_logs.device_id = devices.device_id;

SELECT sessions.session_id, users.username, devices.device_name, sessions.start_time, sessions.end_time FROM sessions JOIN users ON sessions.user_id = users.user_id JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name, resource_name FROM permissions WHERE resource_name = 'file';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u, roles r, permissions p WHERE u.user_id = 1 AND r.role_id = 2 AND p.permission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT DISTINCT role_name FROM roles JOIN user_roles ON roles.role_id = user_roles.role_id GROUP BY role_name HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
